sentences.sContent: Bob Bowman, longtime coach of swimming phenom Michael Phelps, was once asked why Phelps did not swim the languorous distance sets that were part of some other competitors' regimens.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bob Bowman, longtime coach of swimming phenom Michael Phelps, was once asked why Phelps did not swim the languorous distance sets that were part of some other competitors' regimens.
sentences.sCn: 游泳天才菲尔普斯的教练鲍曼曾经被问及，为什么菲尔普斯不做令人厌倦的长距离游泳训练？ 而长距离游泳正是其他竞争对手训练的一部分。

trans.tranOther: a person or thing of outstanding abilities or qualities
